field.intro: This area controls the entire width of your site and background to the body of the site. You can set to fluid or fixed and also set a max pixel width so that once your screen reaches a certain width it won't stretch any further. Click the icon to the right for the lightbox to show all the main body background options.

field.name: xml_s5_top_row1_manual_widths
field.intro:
Each row has the ability to set background options by clicking on the portrait icon. The gear icon is where you can configure custom module widths. If you select the manual option you can then either use the bars to scroll left/right and set the widths or click the icons to the left of the portrait icon to manually type in the width values.

For example top_row1 contains 6 positions, if you publish extensions to only top_row1_1 and top_row1_2 the positions will each be set to 50% of the available space or you can choose to set them percentages manually like 60% and 40%.
field.label: TPL_FIELD_TOPROW1MODULES_LABEL

field.intro:
This area controls the left/right columns, surrounding positions and allows you to hide the article area on any page as desired. This is mainly used on a homepage where you don't want any articles being output.

Backgrounds: The 2 portrait icons in the top right will set the backgrounds for the center area and columns wrap areas.

Columns: If you choose fluid below be sure to keep the numbers small. The total number (including the content area) cannot exceed 100. An average column should only be about 20 or 30 if set to fluid.
The fixed tabs will enable once you add text to them. You just click either one and a lightbox will show up with options for you to set, like colors, left/right position on screen and more.
field.title: Edit Tab 1

field.intro: This is the scroll to top arrow that will show in the footer area of the website. On click it throws you back up to the top of the page. You can enable or disable this from showing on the frontend.

field.name: xml_s5_multimaxheight
field.label: Multibox Max Height
field.description: Set the maximum height of multibox images.

field.name: xml_s5_multimaxwidth
field.label: Multibox Max Width
field.description: Set the maximum width of multibox images.

field.name: xml_s5_multimovieheight
field.label: Multibox Movie Height
field.description: Set the height of multibox movies.

field.name: xml_s5_multimoviewidth
field.label: Multibox Movie Width
field.description: Set the width of multibox movies.

field.name: xml_s5_multitooltips
field.label: Multibox Tooltips
field.description: These tooltips will show the title of the images used for multibox if enabled.

field.name: xml_s5_multirollover
field.label: Multibox Rollover
field.description: Images will turn slightly opaque on hover with this feature enabled.
